    • renderPenalties

      List<String> renderPenalties(int i)
      Generates a formatted list of strings representing penalties based on the specified parameter index.
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the parameter and penalty type to use for rendering penalties
      Returns:
      a list of strings where each string represents a formatted penalty or additional shot information

    • renderShots

      List<String> renderShots()
      Generates a list of formatted strings representing the shots, including direction symbols and corresponding attack details.
      Returns:
      a list of strings where each string contains the attack type flanked by directional symbols representing the attack's origin and target direction
